Articles.Content:
Hey, I was new to KSP a few weeks ago, lurked for those weeks (so I could download .craft files) and only now am I posting!

As for tips, I\'ve been trying to do the Mun-Kerbin-Mun challenge but first I wanted to go orbit-kerbin-orbit. The trouble I\'ve been having is landing back on Kerbin. Everytime I\'ve tried the best outcome has been engine\'s disconnecting. Any tips about that would be greatly appreciated.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
